text: Peruvazhiyambalam is a Malayalam novel written by Padmarajan.http://www.maebag.com/details.php?ItemCode=1869&ItemName;=Peruvazhiyambalam In 1978, it was adapted for a feature film also called Peruvazhiyambalam directed by Padmarajan. This novel is about teenager Raman who kills Prabhakaran Pillai, a local thug in self-defense. It describes his escape from the village by the help of Prabhakaran Pillai's enemies and how he comes in terms with the life at the shelter provided by them. This is a novel which looks at the teenage mind and its guilt towards crime and its aftermath. ==References== ==External links== * Peruvazhiyambalam from DC books * Write-up by DC Books Category:Malayalam novels Category:Novels set in India Category:Indian novels adapted into films Category:DC Books books Category:1979 novels Category:1979 Indian novels
